mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, user_name as userName, nickname as nickname, user_image as userImage, user_sex as userSex, telphone as telphone, create_time as createTime, status as status, birthday as birthday, marrystatus as marrystatus, height as height, education as education, monthly as monthly, province as province, city as city, marrytype as marrytype FROM user_info u WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} AND u.marrytype = #{marrytype}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user_info` ( user_id, user_name, nickname, user_image, user_sex, telphone, create_time, status, birthday, marrystatus, height, education, monthly, province, city, marrytype ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{nickname}, #{userImage}, #{userSex}, #{telphone}, #{createTime}, #{status}, #{birthday}, #{marrystatus}, #{height}, #{education}, #{monthly}, #{province}, #{city}, #{marrytype} )
